title: Advanced Smartwatch System
description: Seamlessly integrate this smartwatch into your projects, harnessing its innovative capabilities for interactive interfaces, advanced timekeeping, health tracking, notifications, and more.
longDescription:
Introducing the Smartwatch Asset for Unreal Engine, a powerhouse of functionality and versatility. This asset includes advanced time tracking with AM/PM and Month/Day support settings. Experience precise calorie calculations tailored to your weight, age, heart rate, and activity choice. The comprehensive app displayer features activity, weather, sleep, music, flashlight, and sport apps.


VIDEO PREVIEW


System comes with example heart rate presets such as idle, running, football, American football, basketball, volleyball, boxing, cycling, indoor cycling, ice hockey, roller skating, tennis, table tennis, weightlifting, chess.


Optimized for performance, the code eliminates casting and ticking. The step counter integrates seamlessly with animations, providing real-time updates. Utilize the flashlight application to display it on controlled pawns with selected intensity. Versatile dynamic stamina system and its regeneration and adjusted heart rate and burnt calories with a clamped range. Stay informed with the robust notification system and implement them by using provided examples. 


Manage battery life efficiently, and utilize example triggers for easy incorporation of each functionality into your project. Elevate your game with this exceptional Smartwatch Asset.
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)


Advanced Time Tracking with AM/PM Month/Day support settings

Advanced Calories calculation that is based on our weight, age, heart rate and chosen activity

Advanced app displayer that include: activity, weather, sleep, music, flashlight, sport apps

Performance wise written code without casting, ticking

Versatile step counter driven by animation notifies

Flashlight application that allows you to send a message to controlled pawn

Sprint dynamic stamina example with clamped range that adjust heart rate and burnt calories

Notification system 

Battery management system

Example triggers that will help you to incorporate each functionality into your project

Number of Blueprints: 32


Input: Enhanced Input


Network Replicated: No


Supported Development Platforms:


Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Linux: Yes


Video: https://youtu.be/rYnZlsq_KPM

Documentation: https://mega.nz/file/4J4EwQiC#QPywvg-8_KKdoPvN0_T4A0cXSBxXuTepaVqyeitzAYI
